com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.model

Interface QueryItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QueryModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryItemImpl

    public interface QueryItem
extends QueryModel
    The QueryItem interface represents a data query and is a type of QueryModel. This query can be applied to a storable object in order to supply more granular data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      QueryItemComparator getComparator()
      Get the type of comparison operation that this item represents.

      Get the sort type for the field referenced by this query item.

        boolean isNot()
        Is this a negated query (logically inverted operation).
        Returns:
        boolean - True indicates that this is a not operation.
